description: This lively restaurant with a young, vibrant atmosphere stands next to the butcher’s shop run by the same family. The menu features delicious Tuscan cuisine, including dishes such as pappa al pomodoro and Florentine steak, which you choose from the display counter. Good wines and friendly service add to the appeal.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
